name: farm-management-system
description: A comprehensive farm management system for goats, cattle, and other livestock

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run mobile" "npm run web"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:web:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend:fix && npm run lint:web:fix
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.update-all: npm update && cd backend && npm run update-deps && cd ../web && npm run update-deps && cd ../mobile && npm run update-deps
scripts.audit-all: npm audit && cd backend && npm run security-check && cd ../web && npm audit && cd ../mobile && npm audit
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:web: cd web && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install-all

author: Farm Management Team
